name: A Normal Night at Tominos
description:
Title: A Normal Night at Tominos

Platform: Print to Play

Genre: Text Adventure

 Game Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: It is the night shift at your local Tominos, and you have received one last order for the night. Any good Tomino's employee should be able to translate inhuman speech, make that pizza, and get to the location within the 30-minute delivery window.  If you can't, you're fired! ...or worse.

Instructions: The HTML file should load in the browser, click options to continue the storyline and back arrows to reverse the decision.

Game Design Team

Paige Smith – Game Designer
